photos_request:
Please send me 1-10 photos of your pet.

You can send them one by one or as an album.

When finished, click 'Continue' button.
script_request:
Describe what kind of video you want (optional).

For example:
• My dog playing in the park
• Cat sleeping peacefully
• Pet birthday party

Or click 'Skip' for a surprise video:
status_in_progress: In Progress - your video is being created
no_requests:

Click 'Create New Video' to get started!
